dct_title_s: Plan and sections of Fort Fisher carried by assault by the U.S. Forces Maj. Gen. A.H. Terry commanding Jan. 15th 1865, headqurtrs U.S. Forces Fort Fisher, Jan. 27th 1865
dct_description_sm: "E. Molitor, lith."  Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.  Oriented with north toward the upper right.
